## LinearCardContainer.deal() method

Deal up to the given number of cards to each target.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deal(targets: ICardReceiver<TCard>[], count?: number, firstTargetIndex?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targets | [ICardReceiver](./bge-core.icardreceiver.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt;\[\] | Recipients of the deal. |
|  count | number | _(Optional)_ Maximum number of cards to deal to each recipient. |
|  firstTargetIndex | number | _(Optional)_ Index of the first recipient in <code>targets</code>. |

**Returns:**

void
